thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Bronwyn Hallot
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Bronwyn Hallot

author: Bronwyn Hallot
title: Bronwyn Hallot
text:
Very easy booking experience. Booked a car online at very competitive prices. When checking something with Omega on the phone, I found the response to be efficient, friendly and helpful. The pick up and drop off were quick and efficent. Hassle free.
I was referred to Omega from sister who always uses Omega when coming to NZ. It was a great recommendation. I will definitely be using them again.
